description.value:
You are a blight on the natural world. Bizarre natural hazards develop within a 300-ft radius around you whenever you linger in a natural area for more than 10 minutes, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug4qh4cuh5f9ralf]{Curse Terrain, Lesser}. You cannot choose the hazards or their locations. However, your movement is unimpeded by undergrowth, as a druidâ€™s woodland stride ability, as plants wither away in your footsteps.

At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.23pgt0f34obki95q]{Feast Of Ashes} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.1msv71n204g06fbe]{Explosion Of Rot} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known.

At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.25iy235izs71qlns]{Swarm Skin} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.
